text: Tomas Morgan Johansson (born 14 May 1970) is a Swedish politician of the Social Democrats. Johansson was the Deputy Prime Minister of Sweden from 2019 to 2022. He was the Minister for Justice from 2014 to 2022 and Minister of the Interior from 2021 to 2022. He was Minister for Migration and Asylum Policy from 2014 to 2017 and again from 2019 to 2021. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish politicians
title: Morgan Johansson
